titleStmt.title: Excommunication excommunicated, or, Legal evidence that the ecclesiastical courts have no power to excommunicate any person whatsoever for not coming to his parish-church in a dialogue between a doctor of both laws and a substantial burgher of Taunton-Dean.

Excommunication excommunicated, or, Legal evidence that the ecclesiastical courts have no power to excommunicate any person whatsoever for not coming to his parish-church in a dialogue between a doctor of both laws and a substantial burgher of Taunton-Dean.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
